title: Commission Regulation ( EEC ) No 453/92 of 26 February 1992 laying down definitive measures on the issuing of STM licences for beef and veal in trade with Spain and Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 453/92  of 26 February 1992  laying down definitive measures on the issuing of STM licences for beef and veal in trade with Spain and Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The issue of STM licences is hereby suspended until 5 March 1992 for live animals of the bovine species, other than purebred breeding animals and animals for bullfights.
2. Further applications for STM licences may be lodged from 24 February 1992.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 February 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 55, 1. 3. 1986, p. 106. (2) OJ No L 293, 27. 10. 1988, p. 7. (3) OJ No L 357, 28. 12. 1991, p. 53. (4) OJ No L 11, 17. 1. 1992, p. 16. (5) OJ No L 37, 14. 2. 1992, p. 8.
